title: Slow cooker pork fillet with beer and veggies
ingredients: ['1kg whole pork fillets', '175ml lager', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '2 potatoes, quartered', '2 carrots, quartered', '6 button mushrooms', '2 cloves garlic', '1/2 small onion, cut into chunks', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon whole black peppercorns', '1 teaspoon dried sage']
